value.name: Amber Alert Suspect Vehicle Found in Santa Barbara Neighborhood
value.description: Konstantin Morozov was described as white, with brown hair and brown eyes, 6 feet tall and weighing 180 pounds. He was last seen driving a blue 2015 Volkswagen Golf, but Santa Maria police ...

value.name: Santa Maria Amber Alert Canceled After 9-Year-Old Boy Found Safe
value.description: About 90 minutes earlier, officers with the Los Angeles Police Department shot and critically wounded Konstantin Morozov on the 5500 block of Lindley Avenue in Encino, according to Officer Mike Lopez.

value.name: Russian boy in protective custody in US after family drama
value.description: 48-year-old Konstantin Morozov. The alert was issued after his mother was found dead in the city of Santa Maria, California. The man was detected and shot by police when he was leaving his friend ...

value.name: Kidnapping, Murder Suspect Out Of Believed To Be Driving Jeep Now
value.description: Police say Konstantin Morozov kidnapped his 9-year-old son after shooting and killing his wife, the boy's mother. Jasmine Viel reports.

value.name: Amber Alert
value.description: Amber Alert Issued For Boy Reportedly Abducted By Father, Pack Of MenModesto Police are on the hunt for 6-year-old Jayce Cosso, who was abducted by his father in Northwest Modesto Monday morning.
